item.title: 加拿大航空公司下调 2025 年展望，原因是前往美国城市的旅行减少
item.description: 加拿大航空公司下调了 2025 年的利润预期，原因是唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战导致经济放缓，并阻碍了一些加拿大人前往美国旅行。【原文：Air Canada trimmed its profit forecast for 2025 as President Donald Trump’s trade war slows the economy and discourages some Canadians from traveling to the US.】

item.title: 美国主导下的欧洲 "临时工经济 "正在整合
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，娜塔莉-龙（Natalie Lung）将探讨美国的 "打工经济 "公司如何将国内的成功经验转化为积极的全球战略。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Natalie Lung looks at how US gig economy companies are leveraging domestic success into an aggressive strategy to go global.】

item.title: 俄罗斯马铃薯危机让普京更加头疼通货膨胀问题
item.description: 俄罗斯正在遭受一场马铃薯危机。【原文：Russia is being gripped by a potato crisis.】

item.title: 胡萝卜加大棒，把制造业工作带回美国
item.description: 我是马克-尼奎特，驻俄亥俄州哥伦布市的美国经济记者。今天我们关注的是美国制造业就业回流所面临的挑战。请将反馈意见和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Mark Niquette, a US economy reporter in Columbus, Ohio. Today we’re looking at the challenges of bringing back manufacturing jobs to the US. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 科技行业警告美国投资承诺取决于科研减税政策
item.description: 为挽救研发减税政策而进行游说的大型科技公司警告说，如果国会不完全恢复这项减税政策，它们可能会放弃在美国进行新投资的高调承诺。【原文：Major tech companies lobbying to salvage a tax deduction for research and development are warning they may pull back from high-profile pledges of new US investments if Congress doesn’t fully reinstate the break.】

item.title: 贸易谈判启动，越南称特朗普关税 "不合理
item.description: 在华盛顿与河内开始贸易谈判之际，越南贸易部称特朗普政府所谓的互惠关税 "不合理"。【原文：Vietnam’s trade ministry called the Trump administration’s so-called reciprocal tariff “unreasonable” as trade talks between Washington and Hanoi begin.】

item.title: 中国央行敦促协调推进通胀工作
item.description: 中国央行呼吁政府内部协调努力，提升消费价格，发出了一个异常强烈的信息，即需要解决这个困扰世界第二大经济体多年的问题。【原文：China’s central bank has called for coordinated efforts within the government to lift consumer prices, sending an unusually strong message on the need to tackle a problem that has plagued the world’s second-largest economy for years.】

item.title: 欧盟冯德莱恩称具体的贸易协议将值得美国访问
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）表示，一旦具体的贸易方案摆上桌面，她可以设想访问华盛顿，与唐纳德-特朗普总统会面，讨论贸易谈判问题。【原文：European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said she could envision a visit to Washington to meet President Donald Trump to discuss trade negotiations once a concrete trade package is on the table.】

item.title: 冰岛央行行长称冰岛可 "应对 "美国 10%的关税
item.description: 冰岛央行行长表示，美国征收 10%的进口关税对冰岛这个大西洋国家来说是可以承受的，冰岛在全球贸易战中表现出了顽强的抵抗力。【原文：Iceland’s central bank governor said a 10% US import tariff is manageable for his Atlantic nation that’s displaying resilience to the fallout from the global trade war.】

item.title: 加纳将提前两个月开始收获可可以遏制走私
item.description: 加纳计划在 8 月份开始下一季可可的收获工作，比原计划提前两个月，以便及早向农民提供现金，并遏制囤积和走私可可豆的行为。【原文：Ghana plans to start next season’s cocoa harvest in August, two months ahead of schedule, to provide early cash to farmers and curb hoarding and smuggling of the beans.】

item.title: 日本 SMBC 将以 10 亿美元收购印度 Yes 银行 13.2% 的股份
item.description: 日本三井住友银行（Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp.）将以约 10 亿美元的价格收购印度私营银行 Yes Bank Ltd. 13.2% 的股份。【原文：Japan’s Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp. will buy a 13.2% stake in Indian private sector lender Yes Bank Ltd. in an about $1 billion deal.】

item.title: 德国商业银行首席执行官看好德国房贷市场前景
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）首席执行官贝蒂娜-奥尔洛普（Bettina Orlopp）表示，德国的抵押贷款市场已经从前所未有的低迷中反弹，现在可能会从政府增加支出的计划中受益。【原文：Germany’s mortgage market has bounced back from an unprecedented slump and could now be poised to benefit from government plans to ramp up spending, according to Commerzbank AG Chief Executive Officer Bettina Orlopp.】

item.title: 贝利为特朗普动荡时期的英格兰银行分裂辩护
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）为货币政策委员会在利率问题上的分歧进行了辩护，称这是唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战带来的不确定性的 "不可避免的后果"。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey defended the divisions over interest rates on the Monetary Policy Committee, saying they are “inevitable consequences” of the uncertainty thrown up by Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 脱离美元的趋势正在加速
item.description:
在许多套期保值交易中，美元不再是首选工具

。【原文：

The greenback is no longer the tool of choice in many hedging trades

】

item.title: 特朗普发动贸易战，中国海外投资激增 28
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）担任总统的头几个月里，中国的海外投资激增，因为面对美国关税的威胁，中国的工厂扩大了海外布局。【原文：China’s overseas investment surged during the first months of Donald Trump’s presidency, as its factories expand their footprint abroad in the face of threats from US tariffs.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚维持利率不变，通胀风险盖过增长放缓风险
item.description: 塞尔维亚连续第八个月维持借贷成本不变，原因是对通胀和全球贸易紧张局势加剧的担忧压倒了数月公众抗议导致的经济增长急剧放缓。【原文：Serbia kept borrowing costs unchanged for an eighth month as concern over inflation and rising global trade tensions prevailed over a sharp slowdown in economic growth amid months of public protests.】

item.title: DeepSeek 戳穿了 "硅谷能控制人工智能 "的神话
item.description:
在短短两年内，中国的开源人工智能运动使其几乎缩小了与美国同行的差距。【原文：

In just two years, China’s open-source artificial intelligence movement allowed it to virtually close the gap with its US peers.

】

item.title: Citadel 在佛罗里达州游说四年内不得竞争
item.description: 肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）的 Citadel 公司正在佛罗里达州大力游说，希望在其家乡允许四年的非竞争条款和花园假，从而加强雇主对考虑叛逃的高薪员工和高管的控制。【原文：Ken Griffin’s Citadel is putting its Florida lobbying muscle behind an effort to allow four-year non-compete clauses and garden leaves in its home state, tightening employers’ hold on well-paid staffers and executives considering defection.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴尔警告关税可能导致通胀和失业率上升
item.description: 美联储理事迈克尔-巴尔表示，特朗普政府的贸易政策可能会产生持续的通胀压力和更高的失业率，从而使美国央行陷入困境。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michael Barr said the Trump administration’s trade policies could put the US central bank in a difficult position by generating persistent inflationary pressures and higher unemployment.】

item.title: 达美航空和大韩航空斥资 5.5 亿美元收购 WestJet 25% 的股份
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines Inc.）和大韩航空（Korean Air Lines Co.【原文：Delta Air Lines Inc. and Korean Air Lines Co. will spend $550 million acquiring a stake in Canadian carrier WestJet, adding to the broader consolidation among airlines globally.】

item.title: 印度计划投资 140 亿美元实施石化项目以减少进口
item.description: 据一位高级政府官员透露，印度东部的奥迪沙邦预计将在未来 10 年内投资 1.2 万亿卢比（约合 141 亿美元），在孟加拉湾附近建设一个石化中心。【原文：The eastern Indian state of Odisha is expecting a 1.2 trillion rupees ($14.1 billion) investment over the next 10 years to build a petrochemical hub near the Bay of Bengal, according to a senior government official.】

item.title: 南非港口工会计划举行更多会谈以结束工资纠纷
item.description: 南非国营港口和铁路公司的主要工会表示，下周将继续举行会谈，旨在解决工资纠纷，避免可能发生的罢工。【原文：The main labor union at South Africa’s state port and rail company said it will continue talks next week aimed at resolving a wage dispute and averting a potential strike.】

item.title: 沃尔沃出售 5 亿欧元债券，关税担忧对汽车制造商造成影响
item.description: 沃尔沃财政公司（Volvo Treasury AB）将于周五出售5亿欧元（约合5.63亿美元）的五年期债券，在关税风险迫在眉睫之际，与汽车制造商相关的票据开始进入市场。【原文：Volvo Treasury AB is selling a five-year, €500 million ($563 million) bond on Friday, as automaker-related notes hit the market amid the looming risk of tariffs.】

item.title: 乌克兰的欧元现金堆随着欧盟援助的增加而增加
item.description: 随着欧盟加大对这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家的支持力度，乌克兰外汇储备中以欧元计价的部分激增。【原文：The portion of Ukraine’s foreign reserves held in euros has surged as the European Union ratchets up support for the war-torn nation.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数关键模型两年来首次转为看跌
item.description: 在贸易担忧笼罩金融市场并使美国企业利润增长前景黯淡之后，股市指标进入了一个历史上与 S&P 500 指数最差回报前景相关联的阶段。【原文：A stock-market indicator has entered a phase historically associated with the worst return prospects for the S&P 500 Index after trade fears gripped financial markets and dimmed Corporate America’s outlook for profit growth.】

item.title: 尽管股价涨幅高达 1,500% ，Swissquote 仍寻求撼动与加密货币的联系
item.description: 2017 年，当 Swissquote Group Holding SA 成为首家允许客户交易比特币的欧洲银行时，加密货币的交易价格约为每枚 2000 美元。【原文：When Swissquote Group Holding SA became the first European bank to let clients trade Bitcoin in 2017, the cryptocurrency was changing hands for around $2,000 per token.】

item.title: 中国称将严厉打击战略矿产走私活动
item.description: 商务部周五表示，中国将严厉打击战略矿产走私活动，要求官员加强检查，以配合出口管制的加强。【原文：China will clamp down on the smuggling of strategic minerals, the Ministry of Commerce said on Friday, mandating officials to tighten checks in line with increased export controls.】

item.title: 随着贸易紧张局势的缓解，以太币在 2021 年以来最好的一周飙升 30
item.description: 受全球贸易紧张局势缓和以及对网络升级的乐观情绪推动，以太币本周引领了加密货币的广泛反弹，并将创下自 2021 年以来的最强涨势。【原文：Ether led a broad cryptocurrency rally this week, heading for its strongest gains since 2021, bolstered by easing global trade tensions and optimism over a network upgrade.】

item.title: EDP 认为停电后伊比利亚电力市场分裂不会造成影响
item.description: EDP SA 是葡萄牙的一家公用事业公司，在西班牙也有发电厂，该公司首席执行官米格尔-斯蒂尔韦尔-德安德拉德（Miguel Stilwell d'Andrade）表示，预计不会受到 4 月 28 日大停电后伊比利亚电力市场暂时分裂的影响。【原文：EDP SA, a Portuguese utility that also operates power plants in Spain, doesn’t expect to see an impact from a temporary split in the Iberian electricity market following the April 28 blackout, Chief Executive Officer Miguel Stilwell d’Andrade said.】

item.title: 搜索警告频出，Alphabet股价暴跌1200亿美元
item.description: 一年多来，Alphabet 公司的股东们一直在担心人工智能给该公司的 "印钞机 "搜索业务带来的长期风险。本周，这种威胁变得更为直接。【原文：For more than a year, Alphabet Inc. shareholders have fretted over long-term risks posed by artificial intelligence to the company’s money-printing search business. This week the threat became much more immediate.】
